data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in District of Columbia, United States to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, help your children in District of Columbia, United States find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in District of Columbia, United States.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of District of Columbia with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 187,035 believers in District of Columbia against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, help the 187,035 believers in District of Columbia to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in District of Columbia, United States know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary:
the state of District of Columbia, United States has a population of 708,300.

We estimate District of Columbia has 187,035 people who might know Jesus, 354,750 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 166,515 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
